      private void logOption()
      this function is called when the user is in the register option but he needs to log in.

      this function is called when the user clicks on the button (register / login ).
      protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState) 
      protected void onPause() 
      protected void onStart() 
      private void onVerificationStateChanged()
      this function checks the status of the verification, if it's completed, failed or inProgress.
      private void regOption()
      this function is called when the user is in the log option but he needs to register.
      void setUsersListener()
      this function connect the current user with his information in the database by checking his uid, in purpose to check his status and sent him to the right activity.
      private void signInWithPhoneAuthCredential(com.google.firebase.auth.PhoneAuthCredential credential)
      this function is called to sign in the user.
      private void startPhoneNumberVerification(java.lang.String phoneNumber)
      this function is called when the user wants to login.
      private void verifyPhoneNumberWithCode(java.lang.String verificationId, java.lang.String code)
      this function is called to check if the code the user wrote is the code he received and create a credential.

        Overrides:
        onCreate in class androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity

        Overrides:
        onPause in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity

      • logOption

        private void logOption()
        this function is called when the user is in the register option but he needs to log in. the function "changes" the screen for the login option

      • regOption

        private void regOption()
        this function is called when the user is in the log option but he needs to register. the function "change" the screen for the register option.

      • logOrReg

        public void logOrReg(android.view.View view)
        this function is called when the user clicks on the button (register / login ). the function checks if the user is registered, if yes, he logs in using phone number auth if not, he registers and his info uploads to firebase database.

      • startPhoneNumberVerification

        private void startPhoneNumberVerification(java.lang.String phoneNumber)
        this function is called when the user wants to login. the function sends sms to his phone number with a verification code.
        Parameters:
        phoneNumber - the phone number of the user. The SMS is sent to this phone number.

      • verifyPhoneNumberWithCode

        private void verifyPhoneNumberWithCode(java.lang.String verificationId,
                                       java.lang.String code)
        this function is called to check if the code the user wrote is the code he received and create a credential. if he wrote a right code, "signInWithPhoneAuthCredential" function is called.
        Parameters:
        code - the code that the
        verificationId - a verification identity to connect with firebase servers.

      • signInWithPhoneAuthCredential

        private void signInWithPhoneAuthCredential(com.google.firebase.auth.PhoneAuthCredential credential)
        this function is called to sign in the user. if the credential is proper the user is signs in and he sent to the next activity, depends on his status (worker or manager)
        Parameters:
        credential - a credential that everything was right and he can sign in.

      • onVerificationStateChanged

        private void onVerificationStateChanged()
        this function checks the status of the verification, if it's completed, failed or inProgress.

      • setUsersListener

        public void setUsersListener()
        this function connect the current user with his information in the database by checking his uid, in purpose to check his status and sent him to the right activity.
